title: CSE AIML syllabus
content: can someone share the course structure and syllabus of cse aiml branch?

comments.body: Check the previous posts here. Sort by new and look at the past few days, someone asked and a comment included a drive link
Is the syllabus the same for other colleges also ?

This syllabus that I've given above  is going to be a little more than most other colleges..... Most of the college syllabbi that I've seen  , tend to have a few subjects lesser.... What college are you particularly asking about?
